wikipedia_page.main: Joseph James Rogers (born 1876) was an English professional footballer who played either as a forward or full back for Southampton, Grimsby Town and Newcastle United.

response: *Joe Rogers (businessman) (1919–2017), American businessman, co-founder of Waffle House
*Joe Rogers Jr. (born 1950/51), American businessman, chairman and CEO of Waffle House
Likened in style to Joe Rogers, Harry was described as 'a bustler, quick on the ball, one of the cleverest with his head.'
